channel.title: GFX Designer!
channel.description:
I am in need of a GOOD GFX Designer for my forum and server. You will get regular player permissions, but will get a special purple and bold name with an icon next to it on my vBulletin forums. Here is the application to apply.
[CODE]Your name (As it will appear on my forum): What time zone are you in? (GMT - *): How long have you been doing GFX: How long are you on the computer per day (Approximate): What program do you use for GFX: If I ask you to do something, will you do it ASAP?: At least 3 examples of previous work: MSN or Jabber that I can contact you on: [/CODE]
I will check back at this thread regularly. Thanks.
P.S. - GFX designers MAY have a better chance of getting mod, depending on how good you are. I may also be looking for more than one! No guarantees on either of those things. Thanks,
Cookiescape.

item.title: GFX Designer!
item.dc:creator: @RuneExtream RuneExtream
item.description:
@RuneExtream wrote:

What kind of work are you looking for? Like what do you want designed or what not?

Read full topic
